components.name: AppComponent
components.templateData:
refreshNew

© Good Morning Pizza Inc.

components.name: ButtonsComponent
HelpMessageComponent
components.template:
1. 메뉴설명
    - 홈메뉴: New Pizza : 피자를 새로 생성할 수 있음.
    - 하단의 토핑버튼 : 추가할 토핑을 선택함.
    - 좌측상단 토핑버튼 : 선택한 토핑이며 버튼의 오른쪽의 숫자는 토핑
      이 선택된 단계를 의미함. 5단계 까지 표시됨.
    - 좌측상단 토핑버튼 : 버튼을 클릭하면 추가된 토핑이 제거됨
      (단계가 줄어듬).
    - Create Pizza : 피자를 새로 생성함.
    - Save changes : 선택한 토핑 정보를 저장함.
    - Delete Pizza : 생성된 피자를 목록에서 제거함.

modules.name: AngularMaterialModule
AppModule
AppRoutingModule
PizzaModule

variables.name: DROP_ANIMATION
Template
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  props: {
    ...args,
    addToppings: action('selectedToppings'),
    onCreate: action('create'),
    onUpdate: action('update'),
    onRemove: action('remove')
  },
  template: `
  <pizza-form
            [pizza]="pizza"
            [toppings]="nToppings"
            (addToppings)="addToppings($event)"
            (create)="onCreate($event)"
            (update)="onUpdate($event)"
            (remove)="onRemove($event)">
        <pizza-display
                [toppings]="pizza.toppings">
        </pizza-display>
  </pizza-form>
  `
})

variables.name: Template
Template
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  props: {
    ...args,
    onCreate: action('create'),
    onUpdate: action('update'),
    onRemove: action('remove')
  },
  template: `
    <app-buttons
        [exists]="exists"
        [form]="form"
        [pizza]="pizza"
        (create)="onCreate()"
        (update)="onUpdate()"
        (remove)="onRemove()"
    ></app-buttons>
  `
})

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
    component: PizzaNameComponent,
    template: `
    <pizza-name
        [price]="price"
        (isInvalid) = "onIsInvalid($event)"
        (name) = "onInputName($event)"
    ></pizza-name>
      `,
    props: {
      ...args,
      onIsInvalid: action('isInvalid'),
      onInputName: action('name')
    }
})

variables.name: uniqueId
variables.defaultValue: (function(){ let id=10; return function(){ return id++;} })()
